plot: Hung-over from a night of drinking, Vicki and Shannon deepen their friendship by discussing the details of David's affair. Meanwhile, the other ladies head out on an excursion that puts them in deep water.

Vicki and Shannon deepen their friendship by discussing the details of David's affair. The other ladies head out on an excursion that puts them in deep water. Later Tamra, wanting to get everything out in the open, sparks a controversy over girl code. Meghan surprises the ladies at the final dinner.
